name: Grinning face
description: Faces with open mouths, more often used to express close to laughter. It all depends on which one you like best, such emoticons are rarely used for a snide smile.

name: Grinning face with big eyes
description: A smiley face emoticon represents a happy smiling face

name: Grinning face with big smiling eyes
description: Smiling eyes here mean real happiness. It is a smiling face that is excited or genuinely happy about something. So you can use this smiley face to show your sincere excitement or happiness or to express your laughter.

name: Grinning face with smiling eyes
description: A happy face is a face with a wide smile, full cheeks, and round eyes. You can send this to anyone when you want to show your happiness.

name: Grinning squinting face
description: A cheerful laughing face with open mouth and closed eyes. Use this smiley face to show your cheerful state. In some cases you can use it as a subtle way to show sarcasm.

name: Grinning sweating face
description: This sweating emoji with its mouth wide open and a drop of sweat on its forehead means embarrassment or awkwardness or, a smile to avoid embarrassment. Some people also use it when they are unsure about something.

name: ROFL (Rolling On the Floor Laughing)
description: Tilted laughing smiley face with tears in his eyes is used in the funniest situations, where you just roll on the floor, laughing out loud.

name: LOL (Laughing Out Loud)
description: This face with tears of joy is often used to express extreme amusement or laughter. Almost the same as the above emoji.

name: Slightly Smiling Face
description: Itâ€™s a very delicately smiling emoji, with a slight smile that indicates either politeness or that youâ€™re not too interested.

name: Upside-down face
description: This emoticon is usually used as a symbol of stupidity and goofiness. When someone says silly things in a chat, you can use this emoticon.

name: Winking face
description: By adding this smiley face to your message, you show your interlocutor that the text is not serious and should not be taken seriously. This smiley face is often used when flirting.

name: Smiling face with smiling eyes
description: Itâ€™s a real happy smile on your face that can be used as a simple sincere expression of emotion.

name: Smiling face with halo
description: This smiley face is best used to express cute and innocent behavior. You can use it with humor to portray bad intentions or sarcastic behavior.

name: Smiling face with hearts
description: This cute emoji means affection, adoration, and sometimes gratitude. Usually when something is sent to you or a question is answered, you can safely throw this emoji saying thank you very much.

name: Heart-eyes smiling face
description: This smiling face with heart eyes is used to show your love and gratitude. It can also be used as a romantic smiley face when someone makes you feel loved and special.

name: Star-struck face
description: The wide smile and stars in your eyes indicate admiration. You can use this emoji when you feel in awe when you see something or someone really beautiful or amazing.

name: Blowing a kiss face
description: To express your love, gratitude, admiration, attraction, and support, you can send this emoticon.

name: Kissing face
description: These emoticons can be used both as a thank you and as a more formal, understated kiss.

name: Shy smiling face
description: A cute smile is probably the most popular emoticon that just means positive, but can also be used in critical sentences as a snide smile or when you sarcasm.

name: Kissing face with closed eyes
description: Despite the name, which clearly encodes a kiss, this emoji many people associate with a whistling person, especially if there is a note symbol next to it.

name: Kissing face with smiling eyes
description: Romance is a must. These emoticons can also be used for the same thank you

name: Delicious!
description: Means yummy or expecting something tasty. Some also use it to hint at food.

name: Smile with a tongue
description: If from the plain text you canâ€™t understand that youâ€™re joking. So itâ€™s a good idea to add this smiley face at the end of the text so that you can avoid fights later.

name: Winking face with tongue
description: It can be used to express some craziness or playfulness.

name: Zany face
description: Heard something stupid? React with this silly funny emoji.

name: Squinting face with tongue
description: Stands for humor that can be used in a response or when you write to someone. Playfulness, and in some cases can be perceived as flirting.

name: Money-mouth face
description: This is not a very common emoticon. It shows money in the language, and you can use it in any conversation related to money, such as when someone tells you that they have invested in the stock market.

name: Hugging emoji
description: A symbol that shows the benevolence of the interlocutor and his desire or willingness to enclose the person in an embrace.

name: Hand over mouth emoji
description: Shows shock, surprise, or sudden realization of something. A typical gesture of admitting that the other person is not telling the truth. Just feels that there is something wrong here.

name: Shushing face
description: Pssst! â€“ Is to silence others. Or someone trusts you with a secret that you canâ€™t tell. Also, this emoji is a good way to show the person youâ€™re talking to that you should shut up.

name: Thinking face
description: Thinkerâ€™s pose: Pensive face with characteristic hand on chin. Calculating or thinking of a brilliant idea.

name: Zipper-mouth face
description: This emoji is used in two different scenarios: one when you want to say, â€œIâ€™m buttoned up and wonâ€™t share your secret,â€ and another when you donâ€™t want to say anything else.

name: Raised eyebrow face
description: Use it when you donâ€™t trust the interlocutor, to express caution or mistrust. This emoji can convey a lot to the interlocutor.

name: Neutral face
description: Pokerface: an expressionless face with a neutral look. Unimpressed, uncomfortable or indifferent.

name: No expression face
description: It is an inexpressive face that is often used to express irritation and anger. You can use it when you donâ€™t want to say anything due to irritation or when you just want to end a conversation.

name: Face without a mouth
description: This emoji is supposed to represent silence. A mouthless emoji advocates silence. Someone canâ€™t or wonâ€™t say anything about a particular topic. Used in difficult, awkward or bad conversations.

name: Smirking face
description: A smugly smiling face. A sign of irony, cold-bloodedness, or playfulness. Sometimes found in connection with flirting.

name: Unamused face
description: Itâ€™s just an unfun and disappointed face used to express disappointment.

name: Rolled-eyes face
description: A face with rolled eyes is often used to show irritation or distrust.

name: Grimacing face
description: An expression of nervousness, helplessness, or shyness. Shy and guilty smile: Someone has done something stupid and is trying to defuse the situation with this smile.

name: Lying face
description: A liar. His nose grows like Pinocchioâ€™s every time he lies.

name: Relieved face
description: Calmness, calmness. When there is a serious discussion, feel free to throw a smiley face that shows your serenity.

name: Pensive face
description: This is a pensive face with closed eyes and a bit of a frown. You can use this emoticon to show and express your sorrow, apology, or sadness.

name: Sleepy face
description: A drop in the nose may indicate crying or a runny nose, but in Japanese manga this is actually a way of referring to sleepy people.

name: Drooling face
description: A drooling face with drool from the corner of your mouth. A sign of desire for a certain person, a delicious meal, a new car, or anticipation of an event. An expression of extreme interest and desire.

name: Sleeping face
description: Good night and sweet dreams! This emoji has a comic book or cartoon above his head for sleeping characters. Emoji is tired, wants to go to bed, or just falls asleep from boredom.

name: Medical mask face
description: The mask is for protection. Either to protect yourself or others from infection. Someone is in the hospital, has to go to the doctor, or is sick. Wearing masks is common in Asia. One of the most popular emoji of recent years, thanks to COVID-19.

name: Face with thermometer
description: A sad face with a thermometer in the mouth indicates illness. Maybe your companion has caught the flu or some other ailment that comes along with a fever. There may also be a fear of getting sick soon.

name: Face with a head bandage
description: A sad looking face with a bandage on the head: someone is sick, has had an accident, or is in the hospital. The bandage symbolizes health problems.

name: Nauseated face
description: Face feeling disgusted. Emoji is already green, he is sick, and it looks like it could be vomiting. May express disgust, dislike and squeamishness or show personal pain.

name: Vomiting face
description: It makes me sick. Or if you want to show that you had a little too much to drink last night. With a vomiting smiley face you can express your negative assessment of whatâ€™s going on.

name: Sneezing face
description: Sneezing face with eyes closed, using a handkerchief. I have a cold! Indicates that someone is sick or not feeling well.

name: Hot face
description: Iâ€™m so hot, Iâ€™m going to get heat stroke! My head is bright red, my tongue is hanging out of my mouth, and drops of sweat are standing on my forehead.

name: Cold face
description: Iâ€™m freezing! Itâ€™s insanely cold here, that you could die of frostbite. The smile is already frozen. Already completely blue in the face from the cold: an agonizing expression on my face.

name: Tipsy face
description: Eyes half open, half closed, mouth skewed, cheeks flushed. This emoji shows a confused expression: it could be tiredness or a confused emotional world. Also known as a drunken face.

name: Shocked face
description: My head is spinning! This cross-eyed, open-mouth emoji is completely stunned. He doesnâ€™t understand if the world has turned upside down. But it also symbolizes strong emotions or feelings of being strongly drunk.

name: Exploding head
description: I canâ€™t believe it! Something very exciting or amazing is happening. The explosive head can also be used to express shock (not always a bad one) or fear.

name: Cowboy hat face
description: Typical American smiley face with a cowboy hat from the wild west. Represents freedom, nature and hard work.

name: Celebrating face
description: There is much to celebrate! No matter what joyous event lies ahead, it is celebrated accordingly. It can also symbolize a carnival or a costume party. Or just congratulations.

name: Sunglasses smiling face
description: Sometimes this emoji is used when someone is very happy with the work done or wants to show off.

name: Nerd face
description: To denote a clever person in both a positive and negative sense: someone who is too clever

name: Face with a monocle
description: This smiley face is usually added to posts when the topic is serious and requires deep and careful study.

name: Confused face
description: You can use this smiley face to show that you are confused, unhappy, and puzzled about something and canâ€™t come to any conclusion.

name: Worried face
description: A worried face because of a difficult situation or an important event. Feels anxious, insecure, and uncomfortable.

name: Slightly frowning face
description: Iâ€™m a little annoyed by what youâ€™re sayingâ€¦. A frown on the forehead may signal denial or anger. But maybe the person is surprised or excited.

name: Frowning face
description: This is the perfect emoticon to describe mixed feelings of frustration, dissatisfaction, and disappointment. You can send this to someone you disagree with for showing your disagreement.

name: Face with an open mouth
description: Wow, Iâ€™m impressed! The stunned emoji is surprised and shocked. Is a positive or negative surprise: from mild amazement to total suppression.

name: Hushed face
description: My goodness! There are not enough words on my unpleasantly surprised face because of the shocking things that are happening. In response to bad behavior or a rude message. Nothing can be added to what has been said.

name: Surprised face
description: Itâ€™s so incredible â€“ I didnâ€™t even know! Surprised face with wide open mouth and eyes: Stunned by the surprise, in deep shock, when you canâ€™t believe your eyes. I canâ€™t believe what happened here!

name: Flushing face
description: He is in shock, in an unpleasant situation or has made a decisive mistake. It also shows shame â€“ something he doesnâ€™t like. It can also be a reaction to a compliment or a message that you donâ€™t want to receive from that particular person.

name: Pleading face
description: There are big shiny puppy dog eyes on his muzzle, begging, pleading with his owner. You use this smiley face when you need to ask for or borrow something. It could be money, a book, a favor, or just attention and approval.

name: Frowning face with open mouth
description: I canâ€™t believe you did that! Shows shock, indignation, fear, and disbelief. As a reaction to a negative surprise. Someone caught you and now feels very uncomfortable.

name: Suffering face
description: The face is in a state of endurance to endure suffering. Use this smiley face to show a state of endurance in unpleasant situations or in difficult circumstances.

name: Fearful face
description: The frightened face full of fear is completely stunned. The smiley face seems deeply shocked and surprised by a questionable event or intense experience.

name: Anxious sweating face
description: No way! Iâ€™m shocked, canâ€™t believe it! Anxious face with a cold sweat on his forehead. Worried. Mouth open, but speechless. Sweating due to stress or mental stress.

name: Sad relieved face
description: Relieved emoji shows that something bad or complicated is over, but he is also disappointed or upset. Experienced a stressful situation with an unfortunate outcome, such as. an exam. One got out of a difficult or delicate situation, but not without bumps and bruises.

name: Crying face
description: The face has lowered eyebrows, with a drop of tears dripping from the right eye. This smiley face represents a sad state due to pain or past events that bring back painful memories.

name: Crying loudly face
description: This emoji represents a person sobbing in two streams, but in the version for Apple devices because of the raised eyebrows and the mouth not skewed from sobbing, it is often perceived as laughing until tears. Be careful with it: if you want to use it to indicate grief, you will be misunderstood.

name: Screaming face
description: A fearful screaming face with two hands. Frozen in fear or receiving shocking news. Creepy emoji can also be used ironically or as a symbol of Halloween. Or a creepy shock.

name: Confounded face
description: How could this happen? Heâ€™s not happy, shaking with anger and helplessness. Or heâ€™s very excited: The last straw is coming soon!

name: Weary face
description: The helpless emoji agonizes and suffers. After a hard day, heâ€™s ready to throw in the towel. But he has to overcome this situation and just get through this period of his life.

name: Tired face
description: The emoji with his narrowed eyes and open mouth is tired. Because of too little sleep, because of what is going on around him from a person or situation. Very exhausted and broken. All he needs now is peace.

name: Steam from nose face
description: This face lets out a smoky cloud from his nose in triumph. When you have triumphed over a problem or person or feel superiority and pride, this smiley face best reflects your feelings. However, it is used by many as a symbol of dissatisfaction or even anger.

name: Pouting face
description: A pouting face expresses dissatisfaction with a person or situation. Beware, danger of explosion! Irritated, already angry and already has a bright red head. When you use the red-faced version, it shows that you are uncontrollably angry and about to explode with anger.

name: Angry face
description: The face has pouted lips and frowning eyebrows, indicating that it is upset or angry. This smiley face is used to express anger or reaction to unpleasant news or events.

name: Swearing face
description: Symbols that cover your mouth show that the person is using foul words, the F-word, and other unfair words. This smiley face shows that you are upset and you canâ€™t help but use foul words.

name: Smiling demon
description: A devilishly smiling emoji with small devil horns. Maybe there is a desire to cause trouble, unexpected evil, or he is just planning some nasty thing.

name: Angry demon
description: The goblin frowns, looks gloomy, and doesnâ€™t like to joke. He should be treated with caution! He does mischievous things or makes impertinent remarks, and he is also characterized by treachery.

name: Angel
description: Baby angle is usually used in the messages about newborn babies. Use them to congratulate parents, or to wish someone a blessing.

name: Blushing
description: This blushing emoji will perfectly suit an expression of sock or strong surprise. Or probably you saw or heard something you were not supposed to? Then this will be a proper choice too.

name: Cowboy
description: This widely-smiling cowboy emoji usually stands for the real â€œWild Westâ€ style. However, it also represents a confident guy, the one who loves to be in the center of attention.

name: Melting Face
description: One of the most popular recent emojis, the melting face, is mostly used during the hot summer days. But it also reflects the state of â€œwanting to avoidâ€.

name: Yawning
description: Do you feel sleepy or just extremely bored? Then this yawning emoji will perfectly depict your mood. Just be careful not to offend your interlocutor.

name: Vertigo
description: This funny emoticon is called Vertigo, even though it is mainly used to express shock or a huge surprise. You choose.

name: Grinning cat
description: A set of cat emoticons for those who think the usual koloboks are not expressive enough and want to add hilarity to their emotions. A smiling cat face is an expression of joy and happiness, which is often used by cat lovers. A cat as an animal can also express femininity.

name: Grinning cat with smiling eyes
description: The catâ€™s face is in a wonderful mood. Her eyes are smiling, and she has a wide grin on her face. You can communicate with her very well.

name: Laughing cat with tears of joy
description: Emoji cat with narrowed eyes and open mouth. Can barely stand and hold back laughter. Something unusually funny or silly has happened that makes her smile with relief and tears of joy can be seen in her eyes.

name: Smiling cat with heart-eyes
description: Joyfully laughing cat face with hearts instead of eyes. In love or very grateful for friendship. Loves something very much and so expresses her admiration.

name: Cat with wry smile
description: The cat is showing sarcasm, or just having fun at your expense. Maybe sheâ€™s in a flirtatious mood. But itâ€™s worth exercising caution here.

name: Kissing cat
description: A cat with flushed cheeks and closed eyes. Leaned her lips in and wanted to kiss you. Cats have a reputation for being very picky and tend to be very reticent to show affection to selective people.

name: Tired cat
description: The emoji with the cat with its paws pressed against its muzzle with its mouth open is considered a manifestation of fear, but in fact, this is how the authors of this image see fatigue.

name: Crying cat
description: The catâ€™s face with drooping eyebrows and lowered corners of her mouth. She is sad, a tear running down her cheek. Got some bad news. But also an expression of empathy and sympathy.

name: Pouting cat
description: The pouty face of an angry cat. The corner of her mouth and whiskers point downward. She is in a bad mood, upset or turned away with anger. Also known as the Grumpy cat, the angry cat who has become an Internet phenomenon.

name: See-no-evil monkey
description: Even though the three wise monkeys saw, heard, and spoke nothing precisely because of their wisdom, these muzzles cover their eyes, mouth, and ears with shame, confusion, and shock.

name: Hear-no-evil monkey
description: A monkey who has not heard anything. Symbolizes the embarrassment of hearing.

name: Speak-no-evil monkey
description: The monkey, who had nothing to say, was speechless at what was happening.

name: Rhino
description: This animal emoji can be used in its direct meaning, or as a symbol of stubbornness and perseverance. However, it can also mean romantic excitement.

name: Snake
description: A beautiful but dangerous snake usually signifies a sneaky person, but can also be used in its direct animalistic meaning.

name: Bunny
description: One of the cutest emojis ever, the Bunny face, stands for something or someone very cute and sweet. You canâ€™t spoil a message with it, as it has no negative connotations.

name: Butterfly
description: A symbol of beauty and elegance, this blue butterfly is able to decorate any message, connected to femininity and tenderness. Also, a butterfly symbolized evolution.

name: Broccoli
description: Obviously, broccoli is broccoli, but not only that! By many people today this emoji is used as a replacement for the non-existent Weed Emoji. So be careful when asking your significant one to go to the grocery.

name: Twig
description: And again, people struggle with not having an official Weed emoji and find replacements in the Unicode set. The Twig emoticon is one of them. Or just a symbol of spring and bloom.

name: Shamrock
description: The most famous Irish symbol is often used in the messages and texts connected to St. Patrickâ€™s Day. But can also stand for smokingâ€¦guess what?

name: Four-leaf Clover
description: The Four-Leaf Clocer is a commonly known symbol of Good Luck, so you can freely add it to any friendly messages or congratulations. Though, it should be noted, that this pretty emoji is also often used to represent weed.

name: Leaves in the Wind
description: Windy weather, green leaves â€” the first associations with autumn, arenâ€™t they? You can use this emoji to describe weather. However, it can also replace the weed emoticon.

name: Cherries
description: If you think itâ€™s just a cute emoji depicting berries, you are very very wrong! Lately, this emoji is most often used in the messages where it can stand for lips, boobs or buttocks.

name: Chestnut
description: Chestnut is known to symbolize autumn or spring mood and vibes, so you can use it in messages about these seasons. But be careful, as in some communities chestnut emoji may stand for buttocks or even testicles.

name: Eggplant
description: Of course, the number one meaning of this emoji is a vegetable. Eggplants are widely used in Greek and Arabic cuisines. But here we again face the double meanings, as on the modern emoji slang this image stands for penis.

name: Cactus
description: And again, not everything is too obvious! Yes, cactus can be used in direct meaning, or when you want to say someone is being too â€œspikyâ€. But also, this emoji signifiesâ€¦middle finger.

name: Melon
description: This melon emoji can most often be seen in the messages about foods and summer. Although, there is also an option for another way of using it: when you mean something tough on the outside and tender inside.

name: Apple
description: An apple a day keeps the doctor away. This red apple alibi can easily be added to messages, connected with well-being, healthy way of style, or a vegetarian meal.

name: Tulip
description: This flower is a symbol of spring, so add it to decorate your messages about the warm months. Or maybe you want to give someone you like a flower? Then put a tulip emoji at the end of the text.

name: Pear
description: Not only a sweet fruit, but also a delicate sign you can let others know you are single! Add this image to your social media profile and get date invites in you DM.

name: Corn Cob
description: One of the most famous ingredient of Mexican cuisine, this Corn Cob and its emoji was also adapted for erotica, so be careful.

name: Peach
description: This juicy peach fruit emoji is the second-famous (after the eggplant) image to be used in flirting messages. This emoticon stands for buttocks.

name: Pepper
description: This red hot chilly pepper will add a touch of spice to your message. You can use it both for flirting or for inviting someone to dinner.

name: Carrot
description: A source of carotene, this super beneficial vegetable, can be seen in messages connected to health or dieting. Also can add it to your Easter-themed posts, as we all know what bunnies love most.

name: Banana
description: Craving for banana smoothie? Donâ€™t get trapped with this emoji, as lately is has become a popular replacement for the Eggplant.

name: Flower
description: A flower can never mean anything bad. Use this emoticon to brighten up your messages and to please someone you care about.

name: Rose
description: The most elegant flower is of course a rose. This is a symbol of beauty, grace, and love. Send it to your loved ones or to someone you care about.

name: Hibiscus
description: In the world of flowers, hibiscus is known as a symbol of feminine beauty, strength and passion. So use it to express your romantic feelings.

name: Cherry Blossom
description: These beautiful and delicate flowers are considered the embodiment of human life, the embodiment of the beauty of Japanese women and the national symbol of Japan.

name: Dove
description: Dove is a symbol of peace and love. This emoji is often used in a combination with romantic images and hearts.

name: Swan
description: Another beautiful specie, a swan, can be used in the messages about love and sympathy, or as a depiction of loyalty and friendship.

name: Unicorn
description: The most popular magical creature, the Unicorn, can signify wonders, but is also often used as a symbol of LGBT pride.

name: Waving hand
description: This is a very classic gesture when meeting an old friend. usually used to indicate Hi!

name: Backside raised hand
description: Raised hand on the back of the hand. Someone wants to attract attention â€“ for example, to put a question or signal their participation in an event.

name: Open fingers raised hand
description: It can be seen as an alternative to the waving emoji. Good to use to greet! someone or you can send this to indicate the number 5.

name: Raised hand
description: This is a simple picture of a palm with all the fingers connected. This smiley face is used to ask to stop or high-five.

name: Vulcan salute
description: You can see this type of blessing in the Jewish gesture, which is a symbolic sign of victory. It can also be used when talking about interstellar travel and alien life.

name: Okay
description: The letter â€œOâ€ is formed from the thumb and index finger. It stands for â€œokay. A sign for agreement or a demonstrative gesture that all is well.

name: Victory hand
description: A symbol of peace. The sign â€œvictoriousâ€ also means victory. Also a way to say Hello or Bye.

name: Crossed fingers
description: If you want to sound hopeful and optimistic, use this emoticon to expect good luck and good news.

name: Love You
description: A fist with thumb, index finger, and thumb extended means â€œI love youâ€ in American sign language.

name: Horns
description: LetÂ´s rock! The thumb and forefinger show the horns. This â€œforkâ€ is the famous gesture of all heavy rock fans.

name: Give me a call
description: The closed fist with the thumb and little finger is reminiscent of an old mobile phone. Also reminiscent of the surfersâ€™ greeting â€œHang looseâ€.

name: Index finger pointing left
description: This way! The index finger points to the left. Can indicate a particular path of movement, point to something, or mark an important part of a message.

name: Index finger pointing right
description: The index finger points to the right. The gesture wants to draw attention to something or remind you of something important. But it is also possible to wag the index finger reproachfully.

name: Index finger pointing up
description: Raise the index finger as a plea for caution or to emphasize what is being said. But it can also signify â€œI have timeâ€ or â€œIâ€™m with you. Someone wants to get attention.

name: Middle finger up
description: This is for showing a rude and scolding gesture when you are angry about something. To show anger and to warn someone, this is the right emoticon you can use.

name: Index finger pointing down
description: In addition to the obvious meaning of direction or pointing to something, the downward pointing finger in some users in various countries may indicate a disgusted mood on the part of the interlocutor.

name: Attention
description: The raised index finger can emphasize the importance of a message or express a request to interrupt the interlocutor with a question, or it can simply point to the previous message in the chat.

name: Thumbs up
description: Thumbs up as a rule is used, to say â€œgoodâ€ or to give confirmation, approval.

name: Thumbs down
description: Thumb down â€“ to express dislike or disapproval.

name: Raised fist
description: A raised fist implies strength and power. It is exactly what you believe in. Similarly, this emoji can be a political gesture and a symbol of defiance, solidarity and resistance.

name: Oncoming fist
description: This is very similar to the high-five emoticon, and it can also be used to show that you agree. Friends often use this smiley face when they make a plan together.

name: Fist turned to the left
description: In combination with other emoji is a sign of hitting it right on the spot. An informal form of greeting. The gesture of both hands clenched into a fist is called a fist salute.

name: Fist turned to the right
description: A symbol that, in addition to the actual fist pointing to the right, can denote a sign of respect or congratulations expressed to the interlocutor.

name: Clapping hands
description: This is the standard gesture for expressing appreciation, motivation, and applause. However, you can also use this emoticon to show sarcasm.

name: Raising hands
description: Hallelujah! Hands raised in the air as a sign of readiness for the feast. May also signify â€œbanzai,â€ a Japanese cry that brings many years of happiness and joy.

name: Open hands
description: It is mostly used as a welcoming gesture. It is also a symbol of courage and honesty. You can also use it as a symbol of an invitation to hug.

name: Palms up
description: It is the most common gesture for praying to God, especially for those who follow Islam. In addition to this, it also represents the reading of something like a book.

name: Shaking hands
description: It is a common gesture, turned into a smiley face to show agreement and friendship. A handshake indicates allies between two parties or friends.

name: Folded hands/prayer hands
description: This smiley face is often used as a praying hand to show respect, greet someone, or say thank you

name: Writing hand
description: This is to show that you are paying attention and marking important points. In addition, this smiley face can also be used to give a commitment to write or sign something.

name: Manicure
description: It can mean literally freshly painted nails, with which it is uncomfortable to type, or the intention to freshen up.

name: Skull
description: This is very dangerous! The skull emoji symbolizes death and danger. It can denote a real threat, but can also be used sarcastically or humorously.

name: Biceps
description: It is for showing strength, dominance and power. It can be used in a situation where you need to express your power and strength. You can do it!

name: Leg
description: â€œYou have gorgeous legsâ€ or â€œtomorrow there will be a leg workout. In fact, this emoji does not carry any specific meaning, but depends on the context.

name: Foot
description: This is a smiley face you can throw at someone you no longer want to talk to, or a punch sign to show disagreement. It is a common emoticon for both men and women.

name: Ear
description: The emoji showing the ear means â€œI hear somethingâ€, â€œI hear youâ€, or â€œIâ€™m all earsâ€.

name: Nose
description: The nose symbolizes in its global concept the sense of smell. This emoji shows that something has a strong smell. Depending on the context it can be a more or less cute gesture.

name: Brain
description: Turn on your brain! Either a symbol of the dividing thought process. Or a way of telling someone how smart they are.

name: Tooth
description: You suffer from a toothache or give a toothache for it. I just need a quick brush or my child is teething.

name: Bone
description: You work hard or youâ€™re just left with skin and bones. The dog loves this treat, but the emoji can also denote a body part.

name: Eyes
description: Watch out â€“ someone is watching you! Two eyes are looking to the left. Something is being observed or checked. If someone sends you a smiley face like this in a photo comment, you can be sure the photo is good.

name: Eye
description: One of the ways to say, â€œIâ€™m watching you!â€ Or to celebrate Something that is very interesting to watch or just to admire.

name: Tongue
description: Showing tongue is a defiant gesture and a childish sign of self-will. It can be used as reinforcement of a joke just made or simply to provoke. Iâ€™m in a great mood and donâ€™t mind indulging!

name: Lips
description: Slightly parted lips and red, juicy lips have a great force. â€œI send you a kiss.â€

name: Shrug
description: Donâ€™t know what to do? Canâ€™t choose? Got lost and confused? Use this Shrug Emoji, which will also work good in the context â€œWasnâ€™t meâ€ or â€œNo clueâ€.

name: Pregnant Man
description: The whole internet community was discussing this emoji after its introduction. But these days itâ€™s mainly used to depict a man with a big belly, or overeating.

name: Biting Lip
description: One of the most flirty and romantic emojis in the list. When you send or receive this emoticon, it means, there is a sparkle between you and your interlocutor. Canâ€™t deny.

name: Heart with an arrow
description: Love you forever. No more words needed.

name: Hearts with a ribbon
description: You are my gift. A sweet and playful declaration of love.

name: Sparkling heart
description: You are my universe. The most romantic declaration of love.

name: Growing hearts
description: Iâ€™m crazy about you. Usually this symbol is used to show awe in the soul toward a person.

name: Beating heart
description: Nascent sympathy. This symbol indicates the first sympathy for the messengerâ€™s interlocutor.

name: Revolving hearts
description: You are my dream. My soulmate. Usually this symbol is used to tell the person youâ€™re talking to about warm thoughts about him or her.

name: Two hearts
description: Two hearts side by side means the most important thing: We love each other.

name: Heart ornament
description: Decorative version of the heart symbol. Denotes love, attention and adoration of your partner.

name: Heart exclamation mark
description: This bright and lovely symbol means one thing: I agree wholeheartedly.

name: Broken heart
description: A broken heart is expected to speak of love longing, sadness, unhappiness, and pain.

name: Red heart
description: The red heart is a symbol of love and romance, everything is classic, no hidden meanings.

name: Orange heart
description: The orange heart is the official symbol of the Friendzone. Means indecisive love, better to just stay friends.

name: Yellow or golden heart
description: A golden heart signifies purity of intentions, happiness, friendship and cheerfulness.

name: Green heart
description: A green heart means jealousy, indicates problems in a relationship or is a symbol of reconciliation.

name: Blue heart
description: The horniest of all heart emojis. The blue heart indicates a desire. this symbol is used to indicate a secret desire without commitment.

name: Purple Heart
description: The purple heart was invented to express love for parents. And in the U.S. it is also for soldiers, as it symbolizes their military reward for bravery.

name: Black heart
description: A black heart signals sadness, longing, and the breakup of a relationship. Also signals that the sender liked the black humor joke.

name: White heart
description: The white heart represents purity of thought, also denotes innocence and is used to express love for children.

name: Love Letter
description: Here everything is quite obvious â€” add this emoji to the love letters you send. One of the most popular emoticons on St. Valentineâ€™s Day.

name: Down Arrow
description: Everything is quite obvious here. Use this emoji with an arrow pointing down to emphasize on a message at the bottom of the page.

name: Up Arrow
description: â€œRead Upâ€, â€œhave you missed what Iâ€™ve just wrote?â€. These are the most common contexts for the use of this Up Arrow emoji.

name: Left Down Arrow
description: This is one of the arrows which barely has any other meanings than pointing the left-down direction. So donâ€™t overthink.

name: Right Arrow
description: This arrow does not only points to the right, but also stands for something to wait for or to follow. â€œComing Soon!â€

name: Right Down Arrow
description: Another example of literate meaningâ€” this arrow says nothing but the right-down direction. No hidden sides.

name: Left Arrow
description: Not only the left direction, but also something in the past. Use this emoji if you want someone to â€œLook Backâ€ or recall a fact or a dialogue which happened some time ago.

name: Up Right Arrow
description: This arrow can signify not only the up-right direction, but also growth and progress. You can use it in the context of â€œgreat resultsâ€ or â€œkeep going!â€.

name: Up Left Arrow
description: Unlike the previous arrow, this one is more about directions that anything else. The inclination to the left makes this emoji not very suitable for depicting any kind of progress.

name: Vertical Arrows
description: Circulation, or even recycling. These two arrows mean almost the same at the following emoji.

name: Counterclockwise Arrows
description: Everything is cyclical! As well as our lives and situations we face, so this simple emoji with two arrows can be used in a metaphorical way too.

name: Up-down Arrow
description: This vertical two-sided arrow is not very common to lean in correspondence or social media, and usually it just means â€œScrolling through the pageâ€.

name: Back Arrow
description: For those who still doubt in the meaning of the arrow emojis, Unicode has ones with comments! This is the arrow pointing to the left, into the past.

name: â€œSoonâ€ Arrow
description: This one is all about â€œComming Soonâ€ or â€œStay Tunedâ€. Use it in the social media posts to make people move to the following post, or to wait for an event.

name: â€œTopâ€ Arrow
description: When something impresses you or you strongly agree with a person, you can easily use this strict and laconic emoji to supporting.

name: End Arrow
description: Thatâ€™s the end, but you can always start from the beginning. Almost the same as â€œBackâ€, but a bit more dramatic.

name: â€œOn!â€ Arrow
description: Use this emoji when some sing is in progress. These two arrows stand for flowing process, which is not about to finish soon.

name: Skull and crossbones
description: Watch out! Danger! The skull with crossbones beneath it symbolizes death. It can be found on poisonous substances and dangerous chemicals.

name: Smiling poo
description: Oh Poop! With this not the most pleasant emoji you can describe a situation, replace a swear word, or criticize a chat partnerâ€™s statement.

name: Clown face
description: This emoji is for fun and entertainment, but can also cause fear in some people.

name: Ogre
description: It is a character of Japanese mythology who is an ogre. At the same time, it is a mask of the mythical creature Namahage, who protects against evil spirits.

name: Tengu
description: Another character of Japanese mythology that symbolizes evil, anger, cruel or mischievous behavior, arrogance.

name: Ghost
description: A laughingly smiling ghost is too cute to scare others and cause harm. A symbol for Halloween or a joke about spooky things, like movies.

name: Alien
description: The alien is a symbol of unearthly life. He smiles sweetly and brings with him only peace and love. It can also mean something or someone strange, unearthly.

name: Robot
description: The mouth in the robotâ€™s face resembles a grimace. Maybe your interlocutor feels that he is being controlled by others and that he works like a machine without stopping. Can be used for insensitive people or in connection with movies or artificial intelligence.

name: Kiss
description: A red, sensual lip print. Someone wants to kiss you and leaves a lipstick imprint in the process.

name: Hundred points
description: The number 100 in red with a double line at the bottom. Could stand for: Iâ€™m very proud, everything is just perfect. I agree with you 100%.

name: Symbol of anger
description: The red symbol, borrowed from anime and manga, symbolizes the swollen veins on the face of an angry person, and it can also be a symbol of a blow, a graphic analog of the sound â€œBam!â€

name: Speech bubble
description: Stands for: We have to talk about it! It can also mean: Just a second â€“ Iâ€™m having a conversation now.

name: Eye in a speech bubble
description: The eye in the speech balloon represents the American anti-bullying action â€œI Witnessâ€. It acts against the abuse of anonymity and bullying in the online space.

name: Angry speech bubble
description: The serrated edge of the speech bubble in the comics indicates loud, furious speech. Someone is yelling, getting upset, or arguing.

name: Thought bubble
description: In comics, the mental ball indicates that the figure is thinking. It may indicate an internal dialogue, that someone needs to think about further actions or make the right decision. It can also signify daydreaming.

name: Zzzz sleep
description: â€œZzzâ€ indicates in comics that someone is asleep. Maybe the interlocutor indicates sleepiness, but it can also hint at disinterest and boredom.

name: Dragon Head
description: Not the most popular emoji to meet in messages or social media posts. The Dragon Head is all about magic, fantasy and mystery.

name: Cigarette
description: Yes, we know, that smoking harms, but some of us still do smoke, and this emoji can be used in a context â€œletâ€™s go have a breakâ€, or â€œIâ€™m dying to smokeâ€.

name: Wave
description: The Ocean Wave is the emoji which is especially loved by surfers and people who enjoy water sports. Although, you can easily use this emoji to add to your messages about holidays on a beach.

name: Potable Water
description: You are thirsty? Then this Potable Water emoji might come in handy. Since Unicode doesnâ€™t have a water bottle emoji anymore, this is our only option.

name: Non-Potable Water
description: Want to warn someone? Can use this Non-Potable Water emoticon, which not only depicts the water that is better not to drink, but something dangerous in general.

name: Shower
description: Tired after working out or itâ€™s just too hot outside, that the only thing you wish for is a shower? You have this realistic emoji to use!

name: Drop
description: This water drop emoji is also often use as a sweat drop, to point on your tiredness or exhaustion. Although, it will also work in a context of a shower, or drinking water.

name: Sun
description: The Sun emoji is a representation of the solar symbol, symbolizing brightness, warmth, and the start of a new day. It is often used to express happiness, hope, and the beauty of sunny weather.

name: Sparkle
description: A very bright and light Sparkle Emoji means nothing by the good moments and feelings. Decorate any message with this glittering emoticon to add charm and elegance!

name: Lollipop
description: This colorful candy would seem very childish, if not the â€œsecretâ€ meaning, in which it is lately being used.

name: Hot Dog
description: Hungry for a snack? Well, be careful in sending this emoji to a friend, as it also has its â€œeroticâ€ meaning.

name: Party popper
description: Joy! Ecstatic emotions, celebration and happiness! This emoji canâ€™t mean anything bad at all. But note, that it can also mean orgasm in some chats.

name: Zodiac Sign Cancer
description: Astrology? For sure. But not only that. This emoji also stands for the â€œ69â€ pose. So if you want to congratulate someone on their July birthday, be careful, unless you mean it.

name: Pumpkin
description: One of the most Halloweenish emojis in Unicode. Use it to decorate your creepy messages, sent out in the end of each October!

name: Moon
description: Moon is all about spiritual experience, mystical nights and magic. Full Moon is a time for extraordinary things, so use this emoji for special messages.

name: Gun
description: This toy gun has replaced a real weapon emoji not so long ago. This is how all major companies started to fight with violence in social media and private messages.

name: Fire
description: â€œIâ€™m on fireâ€, â€œYou look just wowâ€, â€œHot as hellâ€. All these messages can easily be accompanied by the Fire emoji. You can also use it as a symbol of warmth.

name: Santa Claus
description: Looking for a proper emoji to add to a Christmas message? Here it is! What is a better symbol of the all-loved holiday, that Santa Claus!

name: New Yearâ€™s Tree
description: Another perfect emoji for the Christmas season. What is good with this Christmas Tree is that it is suitable for both friendly and more official correspondence.

name: Snowman
description: The Unicode Snowman is a perfect emoji to accompany messages about having fun outdoors during Christmas holidays. Games with kids, family time, pure joy!

name: Snowflake
description: The Snowflake emoji is not as simple as can seem. Of course, most often it is use in its direct meaning, but on the modern song it also means a very â€œfragileâ€ touchy person.

name: Check
description: When something in your list is done â€” here is the right emoji for it. It is also a good image to use in work or school chats. Clear and understandable.

name: American Flag
description: What can the American Flag stand for? Obviously, for something made in the USA. Whether it a car, fashion brand, or a song, feel free to add it to your message.

name: Cap
description: Blue cap emoji in comments and messages means criticism. This meme came from the expression â€œno cap,â€ which in youth slang means â€œno lie.â€

name: Knife
description: This emoji can be used in its direct meaning, or in case when someone feels really angry and furious, on the edge.

name: Ring
description: The diamond ring is most often used in the messages connected to weddings, and serious relationships. No explanation needed.

name: Baloon
description: An emoji, which signifies nothing but good emotions, joy and happiness. Use it in connection to parties and celebrations, or simply to make someone smile.

name: Trophy
description: If you want to praise or support a friend, you can send them this Trophy emoji, which is a symbol of triumph and winning.

name: Car
description: Going on a road trip or just standing in a city traffic â€” then this red car emoji will be handy. It can also mean any automobile, depending on a context.

name: Car Front-view
description: Same meaning as the previous emoji, but more often used when talking about cars in general, not traveling.

name: Jeep
description: If you are traveling of a blue car or on a large car, then this emoji will be a good accompaniment to your message.

name: Pick-up
description: Itâ€™s all the same meaning, just with the other type of car, so use it in your messages if you are a pick-up owner or passenger.

name: Racing Car
description: This car emoji usually means speed. So you can use it when you are in a rush or trying to make it on time.

name: Rainbow
description: Apart from its direct meaning, the rainbow is often used as a symbol of LGBT, along with the rainbow flag or a unicorn.

name: Cross
description: A sign to forbid or end a conversation. This emoji can also be used in to-do lists next to completed tasks. It can also simply mean â€œCancelâ€.

name: Cross Button
description: Despite the same shape as the previous emoji, this cross is more commonly used in lists and work chats, as its color scheme does not carry any negative connotations.

name: Latin Cross
description: This across emoji is usually used in religious context, and everything connected to Christianity and faith in general.

name: Orthodox Cross
description: All the same as the previous cross, but with an emphasis on Orthodox Christianity. One of the most religious emoticons in the list.

name: Football Ball
description: Use this Football emoji when talking about sports, or inviting a friend to ply or watch a game.

name: Soccer Ball
description: This emoji is a symbol of the worldâ€™s most popular sport discipline â€” soccer. So use it for everything connected to it, or any related activity.

name: Crown
description: Crown is a symbol of royalty and majesty, which today is more often used to compliment someoneâ€™s beauty and elegance.

name: Transgender Flag
description: The transgender community flag is used for anything related to this part of the LGBT community.

name: Mobile Phone
description: Use this emoji with everything connected to mobile phones, or if you want to tell someone that you are on the call right now.

name: Phone
description: This red phone emoji can be used when you are sending someone a contact, or when you are planning a phone call or conference.

name: Telephone Handset
description: This handset emoji doesnâ€™t differ from the previous much in its meaning. So use it in the same cases. Itâ€™s just the matter of design.

name: Open Book
description: This emoji stands for reading and books in general. But can also signify someoneâ€™s openness and sincerity.

name: Closed Book
description: Unlike the previous emoji, this book can mean that a person is quite closed or reserved. It can also stand for some kind of secret or mystery.

name: Green Book
description: If you a reading a book with a green cover â€” this emoji will be of a great help to color up your message.

name: Blue Book
description: This emoticon can whether mean reading, or a particular book, or, just like the Closed Book emoji â€” a reserved person.

name: Orange Book
description: Also a book or a reading process. Just pick the color of the cover you like most, and add to you posts and messages.

name: Books
description: Several books in different colors are usually used to depict reading, a book store or a library.

name: Cookie
description: A sweet cookie can mean nothing bad. Itâ€™s whether a depiction of desert, or a compliment to someone you really like and find attractive.

name: High Voltage
description: This bright lightning emoji usually means risk and danger, and is used as a cautionary warning. But it can also be put in the messages about weather.

name: Lightning
description: Unlike the previous emoji, this one is used to describe bad weather, but not only outside. It can also stand for a bad mood.

name: Thunderstorm
description: The Thunderstorm emoji is an accelerated version of the previous emoticon. For a worse weather and for a worse mood.

name: Rocket
description: The rocket emoji can be used in texts, connected to achievements and ambitions. It can also mean high speed or progress.

name: Acceptable
description: This character is pronounced like â€œkaâ€ in Japanese and â€œkeâ€ in Chinese. It means that something is possible, appropriate, or even permissible.

name: Paid
description: Emoji shows a Japanese and Chinese phrase that means â€œtollâ€ or â€œfeeâ€ or â€œpossessionâ€.

name: Free
description: The character shows an offer with no fee or other payment. It can also mean â€œI have nothingâ€.

name: Application
description: In Japan, this sign is found on applications and letterheads. In addition, it is the symbol of the monkey according to the Chinese horoscope.

name: Open
description: This symbol indicates that a business is ready, open or beginning to offer its services.

name: Monthly/Lunar sign
description: This sign is known in both Japan (tsuki) and China (yue). It warns of the imminent payment of certain monthly services.

name: Very well done
description: A white flower with the Japanese font â€œVery well doneâ€ is used in schools in Japan instead of the â€œfiveâ€ mark.

name: Price Reduction
description: A popular sign during a sale, or a global price cut during a certain promotion.

name: Secret
description: This symbol is used in China and Japan to indicate confidential information or just a secret.

name: Congratulations
description: It is a sign of best wishes and blessings. It is close in meaning to the expression â€œI wish you good luck.â€

name: Exam passed
description: This symbol is found in the successful passing of exams or tests. But it can also denote an association, as in a partnership, or a hint of an upcoming meeting.

name: Sign full/occupied
description: This symbol denotes receptivity and free capacities, such as â€œFill up the carâ€ or â€œThis hotel room is still available.â€

name: Discount sign
description: This is a Japanese symbol for a sale. It is posted on the doors of stores during big discount promotions to attract more customers.

name: Forbidden sign
description: This Japanese sign indicates a prohibition or restriction. Certain actions or behaviors are not allowed here.

name: Free sign
description: This emoji serves to indicate an empty aisle or unoccupied. You can find it to signify vacant parking lots or hotel rooms.

name: Free
description: The sign shows that something is free, most often in connection with some kind of service. In Japan it means free food or drinks.ï¸

name: Japanese punctuation mark
description: This character stands for the beginning of a verse in a song. In our country, itâ€™s more commonly used as a McDonald, â€˜s logo.ï¸
